name: The Villaj Prototype
description:
I spent over a month on working out the kinks of various different ways to put together an idea I had, and this is the best working version.

Story is you are a stranger to this town that is being tormented at night by something horrible.

Right now it's just a test of some minor interactions and mechanical things.

Problems:

If you have trouble installing it, yeah so do I.  I have to download the linux version from the itch website, not the itch app  (I deleted a file half way through uploading it which has caused issues with this project now).

On linux, running the windows exe through itch causes firejail to freak out.  I don't know how to allow it other than turning off itch's security option.  Don't forget to "allow execution" on the linux application since it's linux.
